b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "header-ads")) or (data:view.isPost and (data:skin.vars.headerad_onpost == "1px") and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "header-ads"))
data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "hero-post"))

b:with.value: "window.prompt(\"Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C, Enter\", \"" + data:originalUrl + "\"); return false;"

b:include.data: { sharingId: data:sharingId, originalUrl: data:post.url, platforms: data:this.sharing.platforms, shareUrl: data:post.shareUrl, shareTitle: data:post.title, }
b:include.name: sharingButtons

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "ticker"))
data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "trending"))

div.div:
-
<!-- Trending post Label-->
<!-- Trending post Author-->

b:with.value: "window.prompt(\"Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C, Enter\", \"" + data:originalUrl + "\"); return false;"

b:include.data: { sharingId: data:sharingId, originalUrl: data:post.url, platforms: data:this.sharing.platforms, shareUrl: data:post.shareUrl, shareTitle: data:post.title, }
b:include.name: sharingButtons

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "content-section-1"))
b:section.name: Content Section 1

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To Show The Comment System.*

b:includable.b:tag: var exportify = { noTitle: "", viewAll: "Xem thêm", postAuthor: , postAuthorLabel: "", postDate: , postDateLabel: "" }

b:include.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and not data:view.search.label and not data:view.search.query and not data:view.isArchive
b:include.name: inlineAd

b:tag.cond: data:post.author.aboutMe or (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "vtrick-pro-related-posts") or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "vtrick-pro-post-footer-ads")
b:tag.name: footer

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "content-section-2"))
b:section.name: Content Section 2

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isPost and (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "vtrick-pro-related-posts"))
b:section.name: Related Posts

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isPost and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "vtrick-pro-post-footer-ads"))
b:section.name: Post ADS 3
